original_title: Rural Wagon Giving Mail to Branch, U.S.P.O.
overview: The film opens with a man standing at the brow of a hill looking off to his left as a black man pushing a cart passes behind him in the other direction. The man looks and looks. He stands patiently until, from the right of the screen a mail coach appears.
title: Rural Wagon Giving Mail to Branch, U.S.P.O.
